item.description:
Good News Everyone!
After the poll was closed, it looks like the book for the June meetup will be The Lost Fleet: Dauntless by Jack Campbell. It is the first of a series of military Sci-Fi books that I think people will enjoy.

We will be meeting again at Pandemonium in Central Square. There is free parking (after 6pm) in Central on Prospect Street. There is also a lot around the corner from Pandemonium on Green Street ($8 for the night). There is also T access and bus connections.

See you there!
-Josh
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing something nerdy and most likely a scaly cap :-)
item.name: June Book Club Meeting
